title: enna sholli
sahitya:
enna sholli azhaittAl varuvAyO eLiyEn enranai AtkoLLa


anupallavi

  pannaga shayanA parama dayAkarA padam paNindEn sadgati peravE nAn


caraNam    abhayamenra karikkudaviya nAmamO AraNangin mAnam kAttadOr nAmamO
 aran manattiDai sadA japittiDum nAmamO avaniyOr uraiyttiDum Ayiram nAmattil
